name: Candera: The Forgotten Realm
description:
Follow the story of Zaelor, a Guardian of Candera, as he embarks to take down the corruption in his land.



Major Features:

Numerous dungeons to explore, each repeatable if you choose to obtain unique loot!

Over forty different pieces of equipment to craft. (The most powerful equipment comes from the most difficult dungeons!)

Around twenty-five hours of gameplay.

Five post-game extremely challenging bosses to take on.

Many secrets and unusual interactions to discover.

A deep turn-based combat system that utilizes enemy resistances and weaknesses to various elements. A careful eye and some strategy is the key to success.

Gear customization! Socket the exact attachment you need (after acquiring it of course!) into any piece of gear to make it suitable for what is to come.

A large world to explore!
